## createASTAwarePolicyDefinition() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an AST-aware policy definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createASTAwarePolicyDefinition<TOptions extends ASTAwarePolicyOptions = ASTAwarePolicyOptions>(definition: Omit<ASTAwarePolicyDefinition<TOptions>, 'requiresAST'>): ASTAwarePolicyDefinition<TOptions>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

definition


</td><td>

Omit&lt;[ASTAwarePolicyDefinition](./change-detector-core.astawarepolicydefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOptions&gt;, 'requiresAST'&gt;


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ASTAwarePolicyDefinition](./change-detector-core.astawarepolicydefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;TOptions&gt;

## Example


```ts
import { rule, createPolicy } from '@api-extractor-tools/change-detector-core/ast';

const myPolicy = createASTAwarePolicyDefinition({
  id: 'my-custom-policy',
  name: 'My Custom Policy',
  description: 'A policy with custom classification logic',
  createPolicy: (options) => createPolicy('my-custom-policy', 'major')
    .addRule(rule('deprecation').aspect('deprecation').returns('patch'))
    .addRule(rule('removal').action('removed').returns('major'))
    .build(),
})
```
